title: Certain apps on my Pixel 4a 5g keep crashing/refusing to open. Some apps don't, though?
content:
Only some apps are refusing to load when I click them. For example: My Tamagotchi Forever, Cumo, and just the regular Google search engine. 

What is interesting is, I uninstalled then reinstalled the Tamagotchi app, to which, it suddenly started working again. However, then it stopped working soon after. 

Another thing is when I open Google, it doesn't crash until I try to type into the search bar. (This doesn't happen with the Google Chrome application; it only happens when I swipe up to Google something.)

I have restarted my phone, both by pressing "Restart" and by powering it off, then turning it back on again. I cleared up a bunch of space as well, including deleting apps, photos, files, etc. I don't want to Factory Reset my phone, but if that is the only solution, I will try it.
